name: The Whisper Island Mystery
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Panoramic view of The Whisper Island Mystery, bioluminescent coral or cloudstone, weather cues and particles, golden hour / night glow / storm, figures/vehicles for scale, cinematic concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, cinematic atmosphere, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid readable signage or paragraphs; use iconography or blank signboards. No embedded words., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Cinematic view of The Whisper Island Mystery with architecture and inhabitants.
revised_prompt: A panoramic, cinema-style concept art of the Whisper Island Mystery in a scenario influenced by a tabletop fantasy game, implemented with medieval-fantasy materials and gear that adhere to cohesive cultural guidelines. There are no modern technologies, signs, sci-fi UIs, blooming glares or anime styles. It's a unique vision of aquatic fantasy realism, set during the golden hour on the cusp of a storm, where bioluminescent corals or cloudstones illuminate the seascape. Figures and vehicles add a sense of scale, while pressure-dome materials add a sense of depth. The environment thrives with weather indications and particles, set in teals, deep blues, sea-greens, and pearl highlights. Any patterns or signs are unobtrusive and meaningful, avoiding recognizable texts or sentences, instead opting for simple symbols or numbered pins.
